def maxProfit(self, prices: List[int]) -> int:
    min_val, profit = float('inf'), 0
    for x in prices:
        profit = max(profit, x - min_val)
        min_val = min(x, min_val)
    return profit

scope.title: Leetcode 121 - Best Time to Buy and Sell Stock
scope.author: Shashank Rawat
scope.summary: You are given an array prices where prices[i] is the price of a given stock on the i'th day. You want to maximize your profit by choosing a single day to buy one stock and choosing a different day in the future to sell that stock. Return the maximum profit you can achieve from this transaction. If you cannot achieve any profit, return 0.

frontMatter.title: Leetcode 121 - Best Time to Buy and Sell Stock
frontMatter.author: Shashank Rawat
frontMatter.summary: You are given an array prices where prices[i] is the price of a given stock on the i'th day. You want to maximize your profit by choosing a single day to buy one stock and choosing a different day in the future to sell that stock. Return the maximum profit you can achieve from this transaction. If you cannot achieve any profit, return 0.
